reqs: The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.
The WASP platform should be able to decide how to notify the user of an alert for which an event was set.
The system must enable selective harvesting of metadata, including support for OAI-PMH sets; offer API functionality to re-users, conforming to open standards.

Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Site including the clinical site name site contact person contact information and address.
The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.

The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database
Users shall be able to view at least 25 NFL player statistics and points on each page.
Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical site into the system.
The System shall allow on demand generation of all Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents since certain point of time.
The product shall assign the organizers contact information to each meeting they create.
The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time
The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.
The realtor shall be notified of new client appointments after automatic synchronization with office system
All letter requests must be formatted according to guidelines specified by the Print Letter Utility system.
The search results shall be returned no later 30 seconds after the user has entered the search criteria
Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.
User shall be able to create a directed link between requirements in the same document
The system should generate reports on the number and origins of repository end users, including by domain type and geographical location.
The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.
The GCSMiddleware shall handle multiple GCS
The leads washing functionality will validate all leads received by the web service for valid data
The website will allow customers to search for movies by title actor or director.
Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.
The GCSMiddleware shall handle state messages   monitoring messages  and mode change messages  received from an GCS.
The system shall filter data by: Venues and Key Events.
The product shall be expected to operate within the maximum maintenance budget for a minimum of 2 years.
The system should be able to support rapid prototyping, so proof of concept work can be carried out quickly and easily.
Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.
The RealTimeFlightUI shall display the location of active UAVs as icons on the map.
The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment
The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.

The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.
The system must support current open standards and support exposure of metadata in different ways.
2 out of 3 Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall successfully be able to use the system to manage the scheduling of classes and clinicals.
The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.
Only authorized users shall have access to the portion of the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.
The RealTimeFlightUI shall allow users to follow one or multiple UAVs on the map.
100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.
The WASP platform shall provide functionality for end-users to communicate with their buddies.
The system must enable extraction of metadata and data in an open format e.g. to enable migration to another repository platform.
The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.
The system must ingest and store metadata at a data object level, where a data object is a folder that contains one or more files
User shall be able to show / hide each Requirements Table column except ID and Description columns
ll additions of new users and modifications to user's access shall be recorded on the User Report.
The product shall be able to store new room equipment.
The product shall prevent its data from incorrect data being introduced.
The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.
The WASP platform should be possible to determine the location of touristic attractions close to a calculated route.
When the return to home command is issued  the FlightManager shall return the UAV to its original launch location without issuing any additional waypoint or routing commands.

The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies. Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.
90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions
Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.
Each custom object attribute can be set as read only in which case user shall be prevented of changing its value for any requirement
The audit report shall include the total score of the audit which sums the indivual line items.
The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.
If a client registers for notifications  the UIMiddleware shall send notifications for specific events

For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.

The document words shall be matched if they have the same prefix as an input keyword without respecting the case
Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to create a new Program of Study.
The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.

The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.
The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.
The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by users familiar with websites

The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.

User shall be able to mark a requirement including all its children as deleted.

The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request. The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.

A secondary database will be used to store historical statistics and data.

User shall be able to edit requirement text description using following rich text formatting: bold, italic, underline or strikethrough text; numbered list; bullet list; increase or decrease list indent; URL link

The system must support generation of persistent unique identifiers for datasets including DOIs.

The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.

he product shall retain the customer's buying preferences and information.

The website design should be modern clean and concise.

hen streaming a movie the buffering time should take no longer than 10 seconds (plus any latency on the user's connection.)
